name: Dog in the Fog
description:
I'm happy to present my first videogame! Project inspired by the story of the guys who got stuck in the middle of a big city on an island-park because of the fog and the stories of friend about how she caught her dog who ran away.

"Dog in the Fog" is a short game in which you have to find and catch your dog in a foggy park. Due to poor visibility, you will have to look for it by the sound of its barking.

This is not a horror
No notes and diaries
No time race and level ups
Just the situation 

Game created by Ecology141
https://www.instagram.com/ecology141/
https://www.instagram.com/kiiberborea/
Trees by STF3d (UE Marketplace)
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/landscape-pro-auto-generated-material
Dog model by Radik Bilalov (UE Marketplace)
https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/dog-dalmatian-01
